body:
Okay so before the Omega update on the leaderboards you could search up player's usernames and they would pop up.
Can you do that now? If you can how do you do it?
body_tagged:
Okay so before the Omega update on the leaderboards you could search up player's usernames and they would pop up.
Can you do that now? If you can how do you do it?
title: How do you search up people?

replies.body: Ok so go to games. Then click DTM. There will be a score board and on the top of it is a "Search" bar. type his or her name and press search, they will come up depending on their time on the server
replies.body_tagged: Ok so go to games. Then click DTM. There will be a score board and on the top of it is a "Search" bar. type his or her name and press search, they will come up depending on their time on the server

replies.body: Leaderboard > Searchbar > (Make sure to look in the correct filters) :)
replies.body_tagged: Leaderboard > Searchbar > (Make sure to look in the correct filters) :)
